column5: Hi all,  Went out for a couple hours before sunset last week on Eagle Lake. Took Roloff along for the ride, he cracks me up....he actually trembles with anticipation watching the bobber or line waiting for a fish.
LOL, he is waiting for you to fix him a shore lunch!

Watched it during my lunch Simon. Roloffs always a great watch. Enjoy all your vids. Have not seen the young one for a bit. Jack into girls already ? Dam them female, male fisherman distracting humans. LOL
Dogs are a lot of fun when out fishing
another great vid simon! Roloff steals the show again! check your pm!
I wish I lived up there.  Thanks for sharing Simon.
Thanks Simmon very good video.   Art
Me and my old friend Darby.  Joins me on almost every trip off the dock.
i rather watch your videos then the fishing show guys that do this for a living  cheers!
